description: specification of a horizontal pod autoscaler.

maxReplicas.description: Upper limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler; cannot be smaller than minReplicas.

minReplicas.description: Lower limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler.

scaleTargetRef.description: Reference to scaled resource; horizontal pod autoscaler will learn the current resource consumption and will set the desired number of pods by using its Scale subresource.

targetCPUUtilizationPercentage.description: Target average CPU utilization (represented as a percentage of requested CPU) over all the pods; if not specified the default autoscaling policy will be used.
